abstract: BP agreed to sell one of the world’s largest natural gas fields, the latest apparently forced sale that benefited a Russian state company.
snippet: BP agreed to sell one of the world’s largest natural gas fields, the latest apparently forced sale that benefited a Russian state company.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, June 22 — Under pressure from the Russian government, BP agreed on Friday to sell one of the world’s largest natural gas fields to Gazprom, the natural gas monopoly, in the latest apparently forced sale that benefited a Russian state company.

headline.main: Moscow Presses BP to Sell a Big Gas Field to Gazprom
headline.print_headline: Moscow Presses BP to Sell A Big Gas Field to Gazprom
